verbs.description: [V: myrtle] beach local catches shark on video lifeguards near myrtle beach state pier had to clear the water tuesday when they spotted a blacktip reef shark near the shore according to wtvd nicki welch hudson coastal carolina university myrtle beach south carolina myrtle beach state pier blacktip reef
